title: I couldn't attack the turrets in the game I was just in
body: My whole team and I could not attack the secondary turrets in a game, even though we were going to win because we smashed them late game, there was nothing we could do because we couldn't attack any of their turrets.. I think someone was hacking. What should I do?

replies.body:
If you think it was someone hacking, send in a support ticket with details about it.

If it's a bug, which is the more likely one as there are many people experiencing this, then [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
